response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your needs and endeavors. Considering its value and the benefits it provides, I am extending this opportunity to purchase the product for $10,000. This price reflects a fair balance between the product's worth to you and my expectations for its value. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can reach an agreement that satisfies both of us.", "product_price": 10000}
